name: Choong-Jang
meaning: Choong-Jang is the pseudonym given to General Kim Duk Ryang who lived during the Yi Dynasty, 14th Century.This pattern ends with a left-hand attack to symbolise the tragedy of his death at 27 in prison before he was able to reach full maturity.

moves.title: Closed Ready Stance A
moves.description: Start in a closed ready stance A.
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Back. Move the right foot to 3 o'clock into sitting stance. Right side front block with the inner forearm, at the same time executing left downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Stay in sitting stance. Left side front block with the inner forearm., at the same time executing right downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Angle punch
moves.korean: moa so giokja jirugi
moves.description: Bring right foot to left foot. Slowly execute a left angle punch across your chest.

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with the left foot to a walking stance. Right reverse high section double finger thrust.

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with the right foot to a walking stance. Left reverse high section double finger thrust.

moves.title: Backfist front strike
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk ap taerigi
moves.description: Maintain your position. Right fist front strike.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok chookyo makgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with the left foot to a walking stance. Left outer forearm rising block.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with right foot. Right middle punch.

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Turn left 360 degrees facing 12 o'clock. Slide back to 6 o'clock. L-stance middle section forearm guarding block.

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Low snap kick to 12 o'clock with the right foot.

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.korean: nachuo so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Land after the snap kick in low stance. Right high flat fingertip thrust.

moves.title: High turning kick
moves.korean: nopunde dollyo chagi
moves.description: Drop to your left knee turning the body to 10 o'clock. Place both hands on the floor. High right turning kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: High punch
moves.korean: nopunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Land the kicking foot forward. Keep left hand on the floor. Right high punch to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Side elbow thrust
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi
moves.description: Stand and pivot on right foot to face 6 o'clock. Move left foot to form an l-stance. Left side elbow thrust. Looking over left shoulder.

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Pivot on right foot 180 degrees left to face 12 o'clock.  Left l-stance forearm guarding block.

moves.title: Palm scooping block
moves.korean: niunja so sonbadak duro makgi
moves.description: Step back with the right foot to 6 o'clock into an l-stance. Left palm scooping block.

moves.title: Right knife-hand middle outward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Step back with the left foot to 6 o'clock into an l-stance. Right knife-hand middle section outward strike.

moves.title: X-fist pressing block
moves.korean: gunnun so kyocha joomuk kaunde noollo makgi
moves.description: Turn left by pivoting on the right foot 180 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Left foot to walking stance. X-Fist pressing block.

moves.title: Knee snap kick
moves.korean: moorup najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Simulate grabbing head, pull hands to hip and smash right knee up.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Land foot behind left. Pivot on the right foot left 180 degrees to 12 o'clock. Right l-stance knife-hand guardng block.

moves.title: Right side elbow thrust
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi
moves.description: Slide your Right foot forward. Turn your body to face 6 o'clock. Right elbow strike to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees on the left foot to face 12 o'clock. Left l-stance knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: Side piercing kick
moves.korean: kaunde yopcha jirugi
moves.description: Right side piercing kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Twin palm pressing block
moves.korean: dwitbal so sang sonbadak noollo makgi
moves.description: Place the right leg behind the left. Pivot 180 degrees left on the right foot to 6 o'clock. Rear foot stance. Twin palm pressing block.

moves.title: Forearm block & backfist strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok/dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi
moves.description: Step forward with the right foot to 6 o'clock in a walking stance. Right front high outer forearm block. Followed by a backfist high side strike.

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.korean: niunja so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees left on the right foot to 12 o'clock. L-stance high flat fingertip thrust.

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Place the left palm on top of the back of the right hand. Front low snap kick.

moves.title: Right elbow thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so palkup dwit tulgi
moves.description: Retract leg. Pivot left 180 degrees on the left foot to face 6 o'clock. Pull the hands to the right hip in an elbow thrust.  Slide right leg back.

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi
moves.description: Raise & stamp with the left foot into a right l-stance to 6 o'clock. Left back hand downward strike.

moves.title: Punch palm
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi
moves.description: Stay in position. Punch into the left palm.

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi
moves.description: Raise & stamp with the right foot into a left l-stance to 6 o'clock. Right back hand downward strike.

moves.title: Palm punch
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi
moves.description: Stay in position. Punch into the right palm.

moves.title: Knife-hand outward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Pivot on the right foot left 180 degrees to 12 o'clock. Stamp with the left foot into a right l-stance. Knife-hand outward strike.

moves.title: Left backfist high side front strike
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi
moves.description: Stay in place & slip the left foot to a walking stance facing 12 o'clock. Left backfist high side front strike

moves.title: Middle knife-hand outward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Raise & stamp with the right foot into a left l-stance to 12 o'clock. Right knife-hand middle outward strike.

moves.title: Left backfist high side front strike
moves.korean: niunja so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi
moves.description: Stay in place & slip the right foot to a walking stance facing 12 o'clock. Left backfist high side front strike.  Palm on the elbow.

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees on the right foot to face 6 o'clock. Left l-stance. Low reverse knife-hand block.

moves.title: Right 9-shape block
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi
moves.description: Stay in place & slip the left foot into walking stance. Right 9-shape block. Right arm down.

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Step forwards with the right foot to 6 o'clock. Right l-stance. Low reverse knife-hand block.

moves.title: Left 9-shape block
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi
moves.description: Stay in place & slip the right foot into walking stance. Left 9-shape block. Left arm down.

moves.title: Twin horizontal knife-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so sang sonkal soopyong taerigi
moves.description: Step backs with the right foot to 12 o'clock. Walking stance. Twin horizontal knife-hand strike.

moves.title: Right high arc-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi
moves.description: Stay in walking stance. Right high arc-hand strike.

moves.title: Right low front snap kick
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Keep hand out. Right front snap kick to 6 o'clock.  Lower kicking foot.

moves.title: Left high arc-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi
moves.description: Lower foot into right walking stance. Left high arc-hand strike.

moves.title: Right low front snap kick
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Keep hand out. left front snap kick to 6 o'clock.  Lower kicking foot.

moves.title: Right middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Lower foot into left walking stance. Right middle punch.

moves.title: Left middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Stay in place. Left middle punch. Fast motion.

moves.title: High twin fore-knuckle fist punch
moves.korean: moa so sang inji joomuk nopunde bandal jirugi
moves.description: Bring right foot forwards to left, facing 6 o'clock. High twin fore-knuckle fist punch. Crescent shape to sides.

moves.title: Low left knife-hand block
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi
moves.description: Pivot left on the right foot 270 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Left foot into walking stance. Low left knife-hand block.

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi
moves.description: Stay in place. Right high open fist punch to 9 o'clock.

moves.title: Low right knife-hand block
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi
moves.description: Center line turn right 180 degrees to 3 o'clock. Low right knife-hand block.

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi
moves.description: Stay in place. Left high open fist punch to 9 o'clock.

moves.title: Close ready stance A
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A
moves.description: Pivot on the right foot left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Move the left foot to form a closed ready stance A.
